greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of phi(-q)^3 / phi(-q^3) in powers of q where phi() is a Ramanujan theta function.
comment: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
reference: N. J. Fine, Basic Hypergeometric Series and Applications, Amer. Math. Soc., 1988; p. 84, Eq. (32.64).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Expansion of 2*a(q^2) - a(q) = b(q)^2 / b(q^2) in powers of q where a(), b() are cubic AGM theta functions.
Expansion of eta(q)^6 * eta(q^6) / (eta(q^2)^3 * eta(q^3)^2) in powers of q.
G.f. A(x) satisfies 0 = f(A(x), A(x^2), A(x^4)) where f(u, v, w) = v*(u+v)^2 - 2*u*w*(v+w).
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ EllipticTheta[ 4, 0, q]^3 / EllipticTheta[ 4, 0, q^3], {q, 0, n}] (* _Michael Somos_, Sep 27 2013 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n)= if( n<1, n==0, 6 * sumdiv(n, d, (-1)^(n/d) * kronecker( -3, d)))}
(PARI) {a(n)= if( n<1, n==0, -6 * sumdiv(n, d, (2 + (-1)^d) * kronecker( -3, d)))}
(PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x + A)^6 * eta(x^6 + A) / (eta(x^2 + A)^3 * eta(x^3 + A)^2), n))}
(Sage) A = ModularForms( Gamma1(6), 1, prec=90).basis(); A[0] - 6 *A[1] # _Michael Somos_, Sep 27 2013
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Sep 15 2006
